gamification-i18n-welcome: Used to greet the user when reading the i18n/??.json file.
gamification-userprofile:
Page title of the UserGamificationProfile special page.
{{Identical|User Gamification Profile}}
gamification-userprofile-intro: Text displayed on the UserGamificationProfile SpecialPage.
usergamiciationprofile:
Text of the link to the UserGamificationProfile special page on SpecialPages.
{{Identical|User Gamification Profile}}
gamification-notloggedin: Message to display when a user is not logged in and wants to view User Gamification Data
gamification-congrats: Beginning of the congratulation message for earning a badge
gamification-rank-1: Text of the Rank 1 level of gamification badges
gamification-rank-2: Text of the Rank 2 level of gamification badges
gamification-rank-3: Text of the Rank 3 level of gamification badges
gamification-badge-emailverfication: Badge name for the Email Verification Game
gamification-badge-display-singular: Text of the singular badge name
gamification-badge-display-plural: Text of the plural badge name
gamification-name-notpopulated: Text of the name display if not populated
